title:
Quasi-classical Trajectory Calculations on a Two-state Potential Energy
  Surface Including Nonadiabatic Coupling Terms as Friction for D+ + H2
  Collisions
authors:
Soumya Mukherjee, Swagato Saha, Sandip Ghosh, Satrajit Adhikari,
  Narayanasami Sathyamurthy, and Michael Baer
abstract:
Akin to the traditional quasi-classical trajectory method for investigating
the dynamics on a single adiabatic potential energy surface for an elementary
chemical reaction, we carry out the dynamics on a 2-state ab initio potential
energy surface including nonadiabatic coupling terms as friction terms for D+ +
H2 collisions. It is shown that the resulting dynamics correctly accounts for
nonreactive charge transfer, reactive non charge transfer and reactive charge
transfer processes. In addition, it leads to the formation of triatomic DH2+
species as well.
